snippet: The digital music distributor will move into physical sales by taking over Universal's independent arm in North America, Fontana. It should help INgrooves compete against other distributors like Orchard.
abstract: The digital music distributor will move into physical sales by taking over Universal's independent arm in North America, Fontana. It should help INgrooves compete against other distributors like Orchard.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Online Distributor Makes Deal With Universal for Physical Sales
